import sys

a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

print(-(-b // a))

import sys
import math

def main():
    # Get input
    a, b = map(int, input().split())

    # Get number of power strips required
    power_strips = math.ceil(b / a)

    # Print number of power strips required
    print(power_strips)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

A, B = sys.stdin.readline().split()
A = int(A)
B = int(B)

print(B-1)

import sys

def main():
    # Get input
    A, B = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    # Calculate number of power strips required
    # Number of power strips required = ceiling(B / A)
    num_strips = -(-B // A)

    # Print number of power strips
    print(num_strips)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
